org.lightningj.paywall.vo.amount

Class CryptoAmount

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.JSONParsable
      • org.lightningj.paywall.vo.amount.Amount
        • org.lightningj.paywall.vo.amount.CryptoAmount
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BTC

    public class CryptoAmount
extends Amount
    Amount specified in crypto currency where value is the amount in its smallest demination. For example for BTC should the value be specified in satoshis and not whole Bitcoin. It is also possible to specify the amount in sub unit using the optional magnitude field. For example to specify amount in millisatoshis set magnitude to MILLI. Created by Philip Vendil on 2018-11-07.

      • CryptoAmount

        public CryptoAmount(long value,
                    java.lang.String currencyCode)
        Default Constructor, without magnitude
        Parameters:
        value - the amount in smallest unit for the cryptocurrency, for example set in satoshis for BTC.
        currencyCode - the currency code, for example "BTC".

      • CryptoAmount

        public CryptoAmount(long value,
                    java.lang.String currencyCode,
                    Magnetude magnetude)
        Default Constructor
        Parameters:
        value - the amount in smallest unit for the cryptocurrency, for example set in satoshis for BTC.
        currencyCode - the currency code, for example "BTC".
        magnetude - If sub units to the value it is possible to specify a magnitude. for example set to MILLI for millisatoshis for BTC.
